verses.text: In the seventh \add month\add*, in the one and twentieth \add day\add* of the month , came the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by the prophet Haggai , saying , \f + \fr 2.1 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*
Speak now to Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel , governor of Judah , and to Joshua the son of Josedech , the high priest , and to the residue of the people , saying ,
Who \add is\add* left among you that saw this house in her first glory ? and how do ye see it now? \add is it\add* not in your eyes in comparison of it as nothing?

Yet now be strong , O Zerubbabel , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and be strong , O Joshua , son of Josedech , the high priest ; and be strong , all ye people of the land , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and work : for I \add am\add* with you, saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts :
\add According to\add* the word that I covenanted with you when ye came out of Egypt , so my spirit remaineth among you: fear ye not.
For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; Yet once , it \add is\add* a little while , and I will shake the heavens , and the earth , and the sea , and the dry \add land;\add*
And I will shake all nations , and the desire of all nations shall come : and I will fill this house with glory , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts.
The silver \add is\add* mine, and the gold \add is\add* mine, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts.

The glory of this latter house shall be greater than of the former , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts : and in this place will I give peace , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts. \p
¶ In the four and twentieth \add day\add* of the ninth \add month\add*, in the second year of Darius , came the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by Haggai the prophet , saying ,
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; Ask now the priests \add concerning\add* the law , saying ,
If one bear holy flesh in the skirt of his garment , and with his skirt do touch bread , or pottage , or wine , or oil , or any meat , shall it be holy ? And the priests answered and said , No.
Then said Haggai , If \add one that is\add* unclean by a dead body touch any of these, shall it be unclean ? And the priests answered and said , It shall be unclean.

Then answered Haggai , and said , So \add is\add* this people , and so \add is\add* this nation before me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and so \add is\add* every work of their hands ; and that which they offer there \add is\add* unclean.
And now, I pray you, consider from this day and upward , from before a stone was laid upon a stone in the temple of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Since those \add days\add* were, when \add one\add* came to an heap of twenty \add measures\add*, there were \add but\add* ten : when \add one\add* came to the pressfat for to draw out fifty \add vessels\add* out of the press , there were \add but\add* twenty.
I smote you with blasting and with mildew and with hail in all the labours of your hands ; yet ye \add turned\add* not to me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Consider now from this day and upward , from the four and twentieth day of the ninth \add month, even\add* from the day that the foundation of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* temple was laid, consider \add it\add*.
Is the seed yet in the barn ? yea, as yet the vine , and the fig tree , and the pomegranate , and the olive tree , hath not brought forth : from this day will I bless \add you\add*. \p
¶ And again the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto Haggai in the four and twentieth \add day\add* of the month , saying ,
Speak to Zerubbabel , governor of Judah , saying , I will shake the heavens and the earth ;

And I will overthrow the throne of kingdoms , and I will destroy the strength of the kingdoms of the heathen ; and I will overthrow the chariots , and those that ride in them; and the horses and their riders shall come down , every one by the sword of his brother.

In that day , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , will I take thee, O Zerubbabel , my servant , the son of Shealtiel , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and will make thee as a signet : for I have chosen thee, saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts.
